pages.text: Unlike the Nether, water will not instantly evaporate when you are in the Beneath. However, there is also the option of crafting a $(thing)Juicer$().

The juicer is a drinking vessel that allows the compression of $(thing)Mushrooms$() and $(thing)Fruit$() into water. The single-slot user interface automatically processes inserted mushrooms into water.

These mushrooms spawn all over the Beneath. Fresh fruits (such as $(thing)Glow Berries$()) may also be squeezed into water.$(br2)You can also find water and $(thing)Hot Springs$() in the upper areas of the Beneath.
